title: kaN ayarAmal
sahitya:
kaN ayarAmal un kaTTazhagai uLLE kANak-kiDaittiDumO


anupallavi

  viNNazhagA vAzhum maNNazhagA en eNNazhagA enrum iyalazhagA kaNNA


caraNam    puNNiyam eNNAdun punnakai sokkilE ennai marandu nI ellAm enriundiDum
tanmai arindaduvE tArakamAghiyE panmaiyuL orumaiyAm paNbai uNarndu koNDEn
pArkkap-pArkkat-teviTTAda param shuDarE bhaktan shuddhAnandanaip-pAlikkum karuNaiyE
